name: app
description: **client folder**: using to code frontend (React.js) **server folder**: using to code backend (Express.js)

scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start-client" "npm run start-server" "npm run start-keystone"
scripts.start-keystone: cd server/keystone && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider node server.js > nul 2>&1
scripts.build: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install && cd keystone && npm install
